name: mcp-server-gyazo
description: Integrates Gyazo images for AI assistants via Model Context Protocol.

rating.reason: Tool names are clear and specific to Gyazo functionality. Descriptions are brief but adequate, covering basic functionality in 1-2 sentences. Parameter descriptions are generally clear with good constraint specifications (min/max values, character limits). However, descriptions lack comprehensive details about when to use each tool, what specific information is returned, and important limitations. The gyazo_latest_image tool has an unusual required 'name' parameter that lacks clear justification in the documentation.
